title: `propertyNames` is an empty schema
description: `propertyNames: {}` does not impose any constraint on the instance object, so the keyword can be removed.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: propertyNames:{} has no effect
comprehensiveExamples.description: Remove empty propertyNames to reduce noise.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: propertyNames with constraints
comprehensiveExamples.description: Constraining property names via regex or other keywords is meaningful.

message: Remove empty `propertyNames`; it has no effect.
